characters.story: The sickness bends down drooping - an addiction, a craving that's thrilling!
"JYOO!" he commands sharply - gigantic, huge and enormous!
"CHYOO?" the water, giant and tree question curiously - is this a canal, a channel and ditch?
"JYOO!" the fingers command sharply - to refuse, reject and decline the call!
The spear bends down drooping - a square with rules and standards!
"JYOO!" the foot commands sharply - measuring the distance, the gap and separation!
"KWAHNG!" the tree, box and jewel command sharply - a rectangular frame, a border for pictures and certificates!
"KWAHNG!" the bamboo, box and king sing cheerfully - a rectangular basket for fruit containers!
"DZAH?" the stone questions curiously - will you smash, shatter and break?
"HWAY!" the box, water and turkey command sharply - to converge, gather and assemble!
"JYAHNG!" the box and tomahawk command sharply - an artisan, a craftsman comedian!
The box and jail cell bend down drooping - a bandit, a thief and outlaw!
"NEE!" the box and Disneyland command sharply - to keep out of sight, hide and conceal!
"DOH!" he sings cheerfully about the pocket, pouch to carry!
"OH!" the bones sing cheerfully - to hit, fight and strike in the cloud recesses!
"CHYOO!" the car sings cheerfully - the human body, physique and torso!
"AHNG?" the sun questions curiously - will you hold your head high, proud and lofty?
"YEE!" the fingers command sharply - to curb, restrain and repress!
